items.sentence: When I was a university student, I always pulled an all-nighter before a test.
Tom can write almost like a native speaker, but his pronunciation is terrible.
People who laugh a lot are much happier than those who don\'t laugh very much.
Have you looked up the word in a dictionary to see how it\'s actually spelled?
My French teacher tells me that I seldom make mistakes when writing in French.
If Tom hadn\'t been so insecure, he could probably have accepted Mary\'s love.
Tom says he\'s the best French speaker in our class, but I don\'t believe him.
If you have a fever, it would be a good idea to go to the hospital right away.
Tom and his friends pushed as hard as they could, but the car wouldn\'t budge.
Tom couldn\'t rule out the possibility that someone had lit his house on fire.
Tom is pretty good at baseball, but he isn\'t good enough to play on our team.
This isn\'t the first time that Tom has spent a couple of weeks in a hospital.
Tom asked Mary many times to let him go home early, but she wouldn\'t let him.
Tom didn't realize Mary didn't have enough money to buy food for her children.
The price of carrots is going to skyrocket this winter because of the drought.
The dog buried a frozen burrito in the yard, but only halfway into the ground.
Tom's health started to deteriorate after the death of his beloved wife, Mary.
My mother said that as soon as I finished my homework I could go out and play.
Tom transferred some money from his checking account into his savings account.
I only drink whole milk, because two-percent and skim milk taste watered-down.
